allow: Bash(docker compose -f "d:/Products/VastraaOS/docker-compose.yml" exec api php artisan tinker --execute="echo env\(''CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS''\);")
Bash(docker compose -f "d:/Products/VastraaOS/docker-compose.yml" exec api grep CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS /var/www/api/.env)
Bash(docker compose exec api grep CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS /var/www/api/.env)
Bash(docker compose exec api sh -c "grep CORS /var/www/api/.env")
Bash(docker compose exec api sh -c "ls /var/www/api/bootstrap/cache/")
Bash(docker compose exec api sh -c "php artisan config:clear && php artisan config:cache && php artisan tinker --execute=""echo config\(''cors.allowed_origins''\)[0];""")
Bash(docker compose exec api sh -c "php -r ""echo getenv\(''CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS''\);""")
Bash(docker compose exec api sh -c "php artisan optimize:clear && php artisan tinker --execute=""echo env\(''CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS''\);""")
Bash(docker compose exec api sh -c "cat /var/www/api/.env | grep CORS")
Bash(docker compose exec api sh -c "ls /var/www/api/.env* 2>/dev/null")
Bash(docker compose exec api sh -c "cat /var/www/api/.env.local")
Bash(docker compose -f d:/Products/VastraaOS/docker-compose.yml exec api php artisan queue:size)
Bash(docker compose -f d:/Products/VastraaOS/docker-compose.yml exec api php artisan queue:failed)
Bash(docker compose -f d:/Products/VastraaOS/docker-compose.yml exec api php artisan config:show mail)
Bash(docker compose -f d:/Products/VastraaOS/docker-compose.yml exec api php artisan optimize:clear)

Bash(docker compose -f d:/Products/VastraaOS/docker-compose.yml exec api php artisan tinker --execute="echo config\(''services.brevo.api_key''\) ? ''Brevo API key: SET'' : ''Brevo API key: MISSING''; echo PHP_EOL; echo ''Mail host: '' . config\(''mail.mailers.smtp.host''\); echo PHP_EOL; echo ''Mail user: '' . config\(''mail.mailers.smtp.username''\);")
Bash(docker compose -f d:/Products/VastraaOS/docker-compose.yml exec api php artisan tinker --execute=":*)
Bash(docker compose -f d:/Products/VastraaOS/docker-compose.yml exec api php artisan tinker --execute="echo config\(''mail.mailers.smtp.password''\);")

Bash(docker compose -f d:/Products/VastraaOS/docker-compose.yml exec api php artisan tinker --execute="echo ''From: '' . config\(''mail.from.address''\) . '' | Encryption: '' . config\(''mail.mailers.smtp.encryption''\) . '' | Port: '' . config\(''mail.mailers.smtp.port''\);")
Bash(docker compose -f d:/Products/VastraaOS/docker-compose.yml exec api sh -c "grep MAIL_ENCRYPTION /var/www/api/.env /var/www/api/.env.local 2>/dev/null")
Bash(docker compose -f d:/Products/VastraaOS/docker-compose.yml exec api sh -c "echo $MAIL_ENCRYPTION")
Bash(docker compose -f d:/Products/VastraaOS/docker-compose.yml exec api php artisan tinker --execute="echo env\(''MAIL_ENCRYPTION''\) ?? ''NULL'';")
